Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: CBRE Limited is pleased to present a rare opportunity to purchase a leased retail plaza with below market rental rates in the heart of Chilliwack’s North Sardis neighbourhood.Located south of Trans-Canada Highway, on the east-side of Vedder Road between Luckakuck Way and Knight Road, the Subject Property is well-situated in the North Sardis neighbourhood of Chilliwack. This area serves as the commercial hub of the region and is largely characterized by Chilliwack/Cottonwood Malls and big box commercial retailers. The area acts as a transit hub that provides connection points for Chilliwack, Fraser Valley and Metro Vancouver.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: FOR SALE | EXCEPTIONAL RETAIL INVESTMENT OPPORTUNITY  WITH STRONG NATIONAL AND REGIONAL TENANT IN CHILLIWACK, BC

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Diagram by Cressey offers you the opportunity to purchase your own Class ‘A’ office space in Coquitlam Town Centre. Designed by Rositch Hemphill Architects and built by Cressey, Diagram offers business owners the opportunity to own strata office space in an architecturally stunning, 15-storey boutique office tower. With customizable interiors and flexible layouts, Diagram brings a unique opportunity to create space that guarantees comfort, efficiency and convenience. Situated along the vibrant Glen Drive, steps to Pinetree Way and just north of Coquitlam Centre, Diagram is located at the centre of Coquitlam’s commercial hub. Employees will enjoy and benefit from great shopping, convenient transit access, and a diversified landscape – within minutes you can find yourself surrounded by an abundance of shops, services, boutiques and restaurants, or taking a stroll through Glen Park.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: FOR SALE | DIAGRAM BY CRESSEY

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Storia is located midblock of Madison Ave and Rosser Ave, in North Burnaby’s most historic neighbourhood, Burnaby Heights,commonly known as “The Heights.” Storia joins an established community in the Heights, where family-run businesses have prospered for decades. The closeknit, walkable community is surrounded by recreation, schools, a thriving community centre, Additionaly, downtown Vancouver, Simon Fraser University and Metrotown are only a few minutes away via major roads or transit. Area Tenants includes: Anton’s Pasta Bar, Cafe Artigiano, Cioffi’s, Fortuna Bakery, Red Apple Market, PearTree Safeway, RBC, Shoppers Drug Mart, amongst many others.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: CBRE is pleased to present the rare opportunity to acquire two adjacent properties on the 1800 block of Lonsdale Avenue. The site is 7,349 square feet with 66 feet of frontage and 111.5 feet of depth and has excellent visibility on the burgeoning retail corridor of Lonsdale Avenue. The site is currently zoned C-2 which permits mixed-use commercial/residential development with a 2.30 FSR and up to 40 feet of height. Further, the Official Community Plan suggests additional height of up to 82 feet and the potential for additional density of 0.50 FSR (2.80 FSR Total). The existing improvements consist of a single storey retail building with three separate tenants that occupy 3,158 square feet and a paved parking lot in the rear for 11 cars.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: FOR SALE | PRIME RETAIL PROPERTY ON THE HIGHLY DESIRABLE CORRIDOR OF LONSDALE AVENUE

The property has been completely sold out and is ready for both residential and commercial possession.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: CBRE Limited has been retained by the Owner on an exclusive basis to offer the 100% interest in 1622 Pemberton Avenue, a well-maintained retail building located in the Norgate/Pemberton neighbourhood of North Vancouver. The property is well positioned on a rectangular shaped 7,920 Sq. Ft. site in a high exposure area on the East side of Pemberton Avenue and just slightly south of the Marine Drive Commercial Corridor. The existing tenant Cloverdale Paint has occupied the building since 2006 and currently holds a lease until 2023, with no option to renew beyond this term, providing an excellent opportunity for a future owner/occupier. The current rent is also well below market rate; please contact agents to further discuss. With its prime location, the property is well positioned for retail use and may offer future redevelopment and/or assembly potential with the neighbouring property.

The property is prominently situated on the corner of Quebec & 2nd Avenue, surrounded by exceptional retailers, newly constructed luxury residential towers and the funky office/industrial hub of Mount Pleasant. Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: CBRE Limited is pleased to exclusively offer for sale two properties located at 2211 and 2213 Granville Street situated within Vancouver’s Fairview (South Granville) neighbourhood. Located on the west side of Granville Street between West 6th Avenue and West 7th Avenue, the properties are well-positioned in Vancouver’s West Side, centrally located in the South Granville Shopping District and in walking distance to the Broadway Corridor. Short commutes to Downtown Vancouver and proximity to lifestyle amenities on the West Side. The Property has potential for multi-residential re-development for rental housing under considerations of the City of Vancouver’s rental programs, with potential to achieve higher density as a transit-oriented site (currently under review with the City). 2213 Granville Street is currently occupied by Dog Swim Vancouver and 2211 Granville Street is currently occupied with Paul’s Omelettery Restaurant.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: CBRE Limited is pleased to offer for sale a future purpose built mixed-use rental development site with holding income.  The Subject Property is conveniently located next to the intersection of Oak Street and West 49th Avenue in Vancouver’s west-side. Under the policies of the Cambie Corridor Plan, the subject property is designated “mixed use with rental housing” allowing for new densities of up to 3.0 or 4.0 FSR depending on site assembly and affordable housing requirements.  With residential rental vacancies at historical lows throughout Metro Vancouver, this offering represents an opportunity to secure a strategic parcel for future rental development in an excellent location.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: The Haro is Cordova Bay’s newest development that will provide the community with a host of of boutique retailers, restaurants and professional services. With a total of over 35,000 sq. ft. of retail/office space in 3 separate buildings, the Haro development is ideal for a grocery anchor who caters to time-pressed busy families, and retired and empty nester’s alike. The 8,145 sq. ft. ground level space spans over one entire building. Cordova Bay is the only neighbourhood centre in all of Greater Victoria that is yet to be serviced by a medium to large size grocer.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Rare Opportunity for Grocery Owner Occupier

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: The property is located in the seaside neighbourhood of Cordova Bay and within the commercial core of the village centre. This neighbourhood is one of the most sought after areas in Greater Victoria resulting in a dramatic increase in population. A destination for locals and tourists, Mattick’s Farm is nearby with a boutique shopping experience with retail shops and restaurants. This friendly community is an outdoor enthusiasts dream, with the Cordova Bay Golf Course and it’s executive course The Ridge, hiking, kayaking, and canoeing minutes away. The property isapproximately 15 minutes to the Victoria International Airport, 21 minutes to the Swartz Bay Ferry Terminal, and 21 minutes to Downtown Victoria.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Stata Units For Sale

Executive Vice President

Personal Real Estate Corporation

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: CBRE Limited is pleased to present an exceptional property in Victoria's vibrant Downtown core which would appeal to both an owner-occupier or to an investor/ developer. Originally built in 1920 and home to Hermann’s the oldest Jazz club in Canada, the building was substantially reconstructed in 2001 and included upgrades to the roof, plumbing, electrical, HVAC and seismic upgrading. The current zoning allows for a wide variety of uses and the building is fully improved with multiple entertaining areas and kitchen facilities. The building also includes several liquor and food primary licenses with a total capacity of 630 seats. The property is located in the heart of the Central Business District in Downtown Victoria. This highly desirable location fronts the high traffic corridor View Street and is directly across from the spectacular heritage landmark St Andrews Cathedral. Victoria’s retail-dense downtown core is comprised of a diverse range of retailers, from trendy independent shops, to major restaurant, clothing and entertainment franchises.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: PRIME OWNER-USER OR REPOSITIONING OPPORTUNITY WITH HOLDING INCOME

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: The Abacus is a retrofitted luxury condo located at 595 Pandora Avenue. On the ground level, CRU3 offers a fantastic location in one of downtown Victoria’s most active growth areas, LowerPandora. “Low Pan” boasts a healthy mix of shops, services and attractions including, Virtuous Pie, Dumpling Drop, Habit Coffee, Fan Tan Alley, Market Square, Chinatown, and Swan’s Brewpub. The premises include 2 offices, a boardroom, an open work area, a kitchenette and an accessible washroom, the unit is tastefully finished with solid fir trim, full height solid fir doors, and polished concrete floors.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: The Investment Properties Group is pleased to present the opportunity to purchase two strata retail/ office units located at the Sooke Harbour, steps to Downtown Sooke. Constructed with only the finest material, this premium real estate investment is scheduled for completion July 2021. Enjoy a work life balance by positioning your business in this active waterfront community.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Luxurious Oceanfront Office/Retail Strata Units

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Situated 70 feet from the sparkling waters of the Sooke Harbour, this property offers unobstructed views of the Salish Sea. Only steps to numerous amenities including grocery, local restaurants, breweries, pharmacy, boutique shops and more. The property is approximately 23 minutes to Downtown Langford and 48 minutes to Downtown Victoria.  Sooke is known for its numerous outdoor activities with several hiking and biking trails, kayaking and boating through Sooke Harbour and Sooke Basin and weekly farmers markets.
